prompts: Create a futuristic bug-type Pokemon that has metallic features and sleek purple coloration.
I want a Pokemon that has both bug and steel attributes with a unique robotic design.
Generate a Pokemon with a high-tech appearance and a primarily purple body with sharp edges.
Make a legendary Pokemon that resembles an insect and has advanced machinery integrated into its body.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies both agility and technology, showcasing purple and silver elements.
Design a Pokemon that fuses organic and mechanical traits, featuring a streamlined body and vivid colors.
Show me a powerful bug-type Pokemon with a distinctive metallic look and a unique evolution story.
